self = <agentcontrol.adapters.fs_template_repo.FSTemplateRepository object at 0x7b5239446670>
version = '0.2.0', channel = 'stable', template = 'python'

    def ensure_available(self, version: str, channel: str, template: str) -> TemplateDescriptor:
        channel_dir = self._channel_dir(channel)
        if not channel_dir.exists():
            available = ", ".join(sorted(p.name for p in self._base_dir.iterdir() if p.is_dir()))
            raise TemplateNotFoundError(
                f"Channel '{channel}' missing under {self._base_dir}. Available channels: {available or 'none'}."
            )
    
        version_dir = channel_dir / version
        if not version_dir.exists():
            available_versions = self._available_versions(channel_dir)
            raise TemplateNotFoundError(
                f"Template version '{version}' for channel '{channel}' not installed. "
                f"Available versions: {', '.join(available_versions) or 'none'}."
            )
    
        descriptor = self._descriptor_from(version_dir, channel, template)
        descriptor.validate()
        recorded_checksum = descriptor.checksum_file.read_text("utf-8").strip()
        current_checksum = self._compute_checksum(descriptor.root_dir)
        if recorded_checksum != current_checksum:
>           raise TemplateNotFoundError(
                f"Template '{template}'@{version} ({channel}) checksum mismatch; repository appears corrupted."
            )

    def test_upgrade_keeps_template_when_not_overridden(tmp_path: Path) -> None:

        repo = FSTemplateRepository(settings.template_dir)

        service = BootstrapService(repo, settings)
